basic_information.scholarship_name: Warner Family Endowed Scholarship in Speech-Language Pathology in Honor of Alexander Warner
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Warner Family Endowed Scholarship in SLP
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to a first year graduate student within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a Master of Science in Speech Language Pathology. Eligibility Requirements First year student in Speech-Language Pathology Master's program at UCO Must be enrolled full-time Maintain a 2.5 GPA or higher In a short essay, please demonstrate how you display the following characteristics: hard working, active in the department and its activities, and a good team worker who helps fellow students Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
